Reviews.Title: “A quiet place to stay in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: callmehans
Reviews.Content: botel zebra located harbour city centre 10min walk beeing boat pretty tiny beds baths arent staff doesnt speak english friendly helpful information amsterdam food parking etc boat clean breakfast continental isnt complain except stairs scare hell drunk comparable conditions title quiet step partying common comfortable straying city anyway liked zebra amsterdam trip special

Reviews.Title: “Stayed for two nights and it was fine.”
Reviews.Author: meeshy9842
Reviews.Content: ive read lot negative reviews tripadvisor hostelworld didnt bad stayed nights wouldnt lodging ive safe free wifi clean wouldnt recommend stay especially consider yourself maintenance person sleeping bathroom situation toilet system prone issues overall paid relatively cheap considering amsterdam im yes recommending hotel direct towards people traveling budget planning short stay amsterdam otherwise suggest looking elsewhere ps listed hostelworld dog allergies

Reviews.Title: “What an experience!”
Reviews.Author: nixpixi
Reviews.Content: botel zebras cabins soooooo tiny clean beds 5 olds tiny bathrooms dirty shower curtains 100 continental breakfast consist dry bread tasteless cold meet recommend botel ladies romantic couples hope helps

Reviews.Title: “Would never go back!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Neo27
Reviews.Content: extremely tiny humidity inside cant barely breathe water drops humidity toilet doesnt flush properly stayed 3 nights couldnt sleep night shivering night heating hot third night found ourselves hotel nest central station palace ok lady friendly honestly botel deterred theres hardly cleaning uncomfortable cold humid paper thin walls list negative aspects goes

HotelInfo.Name: Botel Zebra
HotelInfo.Address: PO Box 2430, Amsterdam 1000CK, The Netherlands
